snippet.title: Primrows Announcement - Steam
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2903530

Live out your backyard garden fantasy.  Grow, prune, and cultivate your garden in a game of logic, chance, and pattern recognition.  With an ambient soundscape and seasonal, earthy, and organic artwork, Primrows invites you to get lost in its cozy surroundings and mindful gameplay.

The goal of Primrows is to ensure each garden has no two of the same flower in any row, column, or quadrant.  Prune flowers that don’t fit the pattern, water and grow new flowers in your garden.  Flowers grow at random, so you’ll have to consider risk and reward as you ponder your strategy.

Primrows offers multiple game modes to best match your play style, mood, and time constraints.  Weekly challenges with unique rules and flowers keep gameplay fresh and ever-growing.  With a high skill ceiling and plenty of depth, Primrows offers a challenging yet serene and digestible experience.

Also coming to iOS and Android!
Subscribe to our newsletter for updates: https://www.tursiopsstudios.com/#connect

Follow us on socials for game updates!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TursiopsStudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@tursiopsstudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tursiopsstudios/
Discord: https://discord.gg/WvHpHxczTA
